Title: Updates of PDFs for the 2nd LHC run
Abstract: © 2016 Elsevier B.V.I present results on continuing updates in PDFs within the framework now called MMHT14 due to both theory improvements and the inclusion of new data sets, including most of the up-to-date LHC data. A new set of PDFs is essentially finalised, with no changes expected to the PDFs presented here.
